trackers.tracker: <description alias="C" id="subcard_ck" condition="subcard_id == 'more'" put_value="{'toast_str':'操作是点击会员，横划套餐，点击更多套餐， 耗时:' + (xp_time - A.xp_time)/1000 + '秒'}" time="<30000" break_time=">=30000"/>

description.put_value: {'toast_str':'页面停留时长， 耗时:' + (event_time - A.event_time)/1000 + '秒'}
